Attributes.description: Interdisciplinary examination of human mental processes and how these are mediated by the brain. Will draw on cognitive psychology, linguistics, cognitive neuroscience, philosophy, artificial intelligence.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (second-year standing in the Faculty of Arts or Science.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00
